eventName: Azure Developer Community Event – CMR College of Engineering & Technology
title: Technical Azure community event with Microsoft speakers at CMRCET
location: CMR College of Engineering & Technology, Hyderabad
role: Reskill Inspirer – Hyderabad Region / Event Lead
description: Co-led and organized a two-day Azure-focused technical event at CMRCET featuring Microsoft employees Adithya Saladi and Krutam Hathi, focused on Azure technologies, cloud innovation, and career pathways.
myContribution: Coordinated event logistics, managed registrations, coordinated with faculty, engaged with speakers, and inspired students as Reskill Inspirer for Hyderabad.
impact: Strengthened collaboration between CMRCET and Microsoft Azure Developer Community.
Provided students with direct industry exposure and real-world insights.
Motivated participants to pursue Azure certifications and projects.
Built strong community engagement with support from faculty under the guidance of Dr. Hima Bindu (Dean of Training & Placements).
